pageTitle: Pat Fry reckons that Ferrari must maintain an aggressive approach - The Formula 1 News
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {11601=Ferrari’s Technical Director Pat Fry is convinced that the team needs to maintain its aggressive work if they want to remain in the hunt for the championship title in 2012., 9745=With the major upgrade brought in by Ferrari in Barcelona, the F2012 was competitive enough to allow Fernando Alonso to fight and secure the second place on the podium. The Spaniard joined Sebastian Vettel for the lead in the drivers’ championship with both having 61 points.}
